verbs.description: President Donald Trump 's youngest son , Barron , [V: will] attend St. Andrew 's Episcopal School in Potomac , Maryland , this fall . First lady Melania Trump confirmed the news in a statement to News4 .

President Donald Trump 's youngest son , Barron , will attend St. Andrew 's Episcopal School in Potomac , Maryland , this fall . [ARG0: First lady Melania Trump] [V: confirmed] [ARG1: the news] [ARGM-LOC: in a statement to News4] .
